description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by attaching it to the DOM element with id 'root' and renders the App component within StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component hierarchy into the created root.
